```{r child_sidebar2}
## choose genes
radioButtons("ess_gen_clust",h4("Gene or cluster:"),
  choices=c("gene","pathway","cluster"),
  selected="gene")

conditionalPanel("input.ess_gen_clust == 'gene'",
  pickerInput(
  	inputId = "eid2",
  	label = h4("Gene:"),
  	choices = eids.all[match(mems$eid,eids.all)],
  	options = list(`live-search` = TRUE)))

conditionalPanel("input.ess_gen_clust == 'pathway'",
  pickerInput(
  	inputId = "path2",
  	label = h4("Pathway:"),
  	choices = names(msigdb.ess)[1:100],
  	options = list(`live-search` = TRUE)))

conditionalPanel("input.ess_gen_clust == 'cluster'",
  pickerInput(
  	inputId = "clust2",
  	label = h4("cluster:"),
  	choices = 1:100,
  	options = list(`live-search` = TRUE)))
```
